code: import{ADD_EDIT_TODO,ADD_TODO,DELETE_TODO,EDIT_TODO,REMOVE_EDITID,TOGGLE_COMPLETED,TOGGLE_IMPORTANT}from"./utils";export var addTodo=function addTodo(title){return{type:ADD_TODO,payload:{title:title}};};export var toggleCompleted=function toggleCompleted(id){return{type:TOGGLE_COMPLETED,payload:{id:id}};};export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(id){return{type:DELETE_TODO,payload:{id:id}};};export var toggleImportant=function toggleImportant(id){return{type:TOGGLE_IMPORTANT,payload:{id:id}};};export var editTodo=function editTodo(id){return{type:EDIT_TODO,payload:{id:id}};};export var remvoeeditid=function remvoeeditid(){return{type:REMOVE_EDITID};};export var addedittodo=function addedittodo(id,title){return{type:ADD_EDIT_TODO,payload:{id:id,title:title}};};
